item.name: hairbrush
item.description: A golden hairbrush, with a soft wood handle.
item.feel: The hairbrush feels soft yet sturdy.

item.name: silkskeins
item.description: A skein of silk, woven from the smallest of spiders.
item.feel: It's smooth and soft, and it makes you want to roll around in it.

item.name: braid
item.description: An impressively thick, woven braid.
item.feel: Soft, silky, and well moisturized, yet rugged.

item.name: apple
item.description: That looks like a delicious apple, probably an Envy.
item.eat: It was an Envy! And also poisoned. Have fun with that!

item.name: mirror
item.description: A disturbing lack of a reflection doesn't stare you back in the face.
item.break: Seventy times seven years of bad luck for you!

item.name: tools
item.description: An awl, a hammer, a needle and thread, a saw, some paper, and a wooden head.

item.name: gingerbread
item.description: It wants to eat you. I mean it wants you to eat it.
item.eat: It crumbles in your mouth, cinnamon and sugar filling your nose. You sneeze.

item.name: oven
item.description: This oven looks like it could fit anything, like even you!
item.use: What do you want to do - BAKE a PI?

item.name: cage
item.description: Yes. It is a cage.

item.name: chest
item.description: The chest is so ornate, you don't even think you need to open it.
item.open: When you open the chest, you notice lots of treasure inside!

item.name: treasure
item.description: This is it! These are the NINE secrets of baking!

item.name: doors
item.description: These doors are magnificent. They could take you anywhere!
item.open: The doors creak and moan... and stay shut.

item.name: bag
item.description: You know the bag is full of insects. What kind? Do you REALLY want to know?

item.name: insects
item.description: Little, annoying, biting. Ya know - insects.
item.squish: In a flurry of activity, you crush the life out of all FIVE of the little, helpless, peace loving insects. You monster.

item.name: crystalsphere
item.description: You stare into the translucent, perfect crystal, and feel like it might be nice in there. It could be the end. It could just be the best thing - PERIOD.
item.rub: You rub the sphere, wishing your secret wish.

item.name: bed
item.description: Look at that thread count! Look at design! This is the bed of the century!
item.sleep: You take a quick snooze, and waken refreshed.

item.name: spindle
item.description: It may be old, but you feel like you could still go the whole nine yards with this thing.

item.name: box
item.description: This could be a first aid kit, or it could just be a box.

item.name: firstaidkit
item.description: Bandages, ointment, and a small knife. You could fix SIX small wounds with this.

item.name: chair
item.description: A chair to some, a bed to others.
item.sit: You take a long needed rest on this amazing chair, around NINE minutes.

item.name: invitation
item.description: You open the invitation, which you notice is from the prince and NOT addressed to you. Stop snooping!
item.read: The invitation contains some highly suspect things, such as 'Prince' and 'Ball' and a reference to some kind of required dress.

item.name: table
item.description: This table has some markings on it - "If Kings Eat Apples"

item.name: boxes
item.description: Large and rectangular, at least they don't remind you of coffins.

item.name: gowns
item.description: A selection of beautiful gowns, all with impossibly small stitching.

item.name: glassslipper
item.description: There is just no way this would fit you, right?

item.name: straw
item.description: You can INDEED smell the straw outside, and you wish you couldn't.

item.name: lockeddoors
item.description: These doors are tightly shut, and there appears to be no keyhole that you can find.

item.name: hay
item.description: Hey, Listen! It's hay!

item.name: goldbars
item.description: These just don't seem to fit. Who would leave all this wealth just laying around?

item.name: book
item.description: You browse through the book. These are indeed the Best Baby Names, and thank goodness none of them are yours!

item.name: tea
item.description: Chamomile, or perhaps wolfsbane? You can't quite tell but it smells delicious!

item.name: lozenges
item.description: Not individually wrapped, not even really individual. Best steer clear.

item.name: tissue
item.description: Honestly, what a waste of a good tree!

item.name: nightstand
item.description: It looks more like a nightsit with how short it is.

item.name: cape
item.description: This is it, the thing you've been missing to complete you're outift and let you take your creed!

item.name: sleepingcap
item.description: This looks just so helpful, if only you were significantly older.

item.name: basket
item.description: The basket is sturdy and well used, with no frayed edges or holes to be found.

item.name: food
item.description: This is not the food you're looking for. Move along.

item.name: packages
item.description: Forrest delivery service - right to your cottage!

item.name: shoes
item.description: You feel like these shoes could only have been made by tiny elves, or perhaps gremlins.

item.name: clothing
item.description: The clothing, while folded, is just so small and cute you can't imagine who would fit in such finery!

item.name: workbench
item.description: This husky workbench looks like you could make things on it forever.

item.name: ax
item.description: A sturdy handle, a sharp blade, why are you splitting hairs over it?

item.name: nest
item.description: What could possible live in a nest inside a house like this?

item.name: goldenfeather
item.description: I wager if you took a closer gander, you might get tickled!
